item.title: Market Madness, Manufacturing, and the Liberation Day of It All
item.description: Donald Trump’s tariff announcements are roiling the markets. On this week’s special episode of Uncanny Valley, we break it all down.

item.title: US DOGE Service Agreement With Department of Labor Shows $1.3 Million Fee—and Details Its Mission
item.description: The unsigned agreement between the US DOGE Service and the Department of Labor provides significant insight into DOGE’s work with federal agencies.

item.title: So You’ve Got a 'Fortnite' Accent and You Want to Get Rid of It
item.description: Players of the mega-popular battle-royale game have a particular way of speaking. Unlearning it can be a challenge.

item.title: Spyware Maker NSO Group Is Paving a Path Back Into Trump’s America
item.description: The Israeli spyware maker, still on the US Commerce Department’s “blacklist,” has hired a new lobbying firm with direct ties to the Trump administrati...

item.title: BYD Launches Denza in Europe—Another Mighty Impressive EV Brand the US Won’t Get
item.description: BYD’s premium sub-brand is all set to take on Audi, BMW, and Mercedes with its crab-walking, blowout-beating Z9GT leading the charge.
